eda ejapa palanayata erehiwa landanayen impot kala chandrika mathuwuye janathawage sihina kumariyaka lesayi.pasu kaleka aa chaura rajinakwa hina kudu kirima wenama kathawaki.habayi wipakshaye podu apekshikawa lesa aya mathuwu hiroyin tayip eka anuwa ape jandadayakaya namathi awurudu haththawakata aasanna kalayak thisse andena harakunwa 77 ta pasu sidu kala supirima andima karannata ayata haki wuwaya .api 2014 di aayeth 94kata pamina sitimu.namuth podu apekshakaya lesa gamini malani keneku thaba akila danudhdara keneku wath penena thek manayaka natha.teni bandu pannaye bala wihilu karayeku bihi wime idakada wadiya.manda yath mahindage aanduwa saha kade yana un ,madihath sithin bala sitina un pamanak nowa poddek bihi karannata datha kana unda podda upangeyi komitalayak bawata path kara gena atha.kohomath ape ayiyala akkala wije kiya rawatune wilsan karutaya.tika kalak yana wita wira salu pili pitinma dushtaya ake purinnata patan gath wita thawath wira penumak sahitha dushtayekuge pihita pathimu .48 patan kathawa ehemaya.ake purina dushtayeku ape loke wiraya unath komital wihilukarayeku wiraya kara ganuma sinhala apita tharam nowemu.api kohomath paswan dahasakata budu wanta balu gaththata anukampa karanta pannaye jiwana ratawakata yati hithin kamathi jathiyaki.suddo kale reddi kakkusi wala runnaya kiyana api awurudu dedas ganakata passe sudda nathnam china nathuwa bettak wath yawa ganna bari thanaka inne ee hindaya .
